<HighLevelDetails>
This repository contains a bookdown project which aims to teach undergradutae psychology students basic data analysis skills using R and RStudio. 
Thus, the tone of written text should be instructive and warm. The code should be simple and well commented.
<HighLevelDetails>

<CodingStandards>
Only use the packages here and tidyverse. Variables should be clear and meaningfully named.
Piping should be used where possible. 
Write clear and concise comments for each function.
<CodingStandards>

<ProjectStructure>
There is an Rmd file for each chapter. There are 6 chapters (filenames start with 01 to 06.
Images are in images. Data and Output are folders that will be referenced by the code in the book.
The rest of the documents relate to metadata for the bookdown project.
<ProjectStructure>
